title: Attributes of child elements are not copied if no element description is available

content.raw:
Attributes of unknown SDF elements (e.g. plugin configuration) should also be copied in the `sdf::copyChildren()` function in `sdf/interface/parser.cc`. The current version only copies attributes of elements that have a description.

I am using attributes in some plugin configuration elements and it took me a while to find out why I cannot access them in the plugin's Load() method any more...

I am using Gazebo version 1.5 shipped with groovy. In fuerte, using the old parser_deprecated.cc that has been removed in d7dbe92b6426674e33891035223605f390599dcb, having attributes in plugin child elements worked without problems.
content.html:
Attributes of unknown SDF elements (e.g. plugin configuration) should also be copied in the sdf::copyChildren() function in sdf/interface/parser.cc. The current version only copies attributes of elements that have a description.

I am using attributes in some plugin configuration elements and it took me a while to find out why I cannot access them in the plugin's Load() method any more...

I am using Gazebo version 1.5 shipped with groovy. In fuerte, using the old parser_deprecated.cc that has been removed in d7dbe92b6426674e33891035223605f390599dcb, having attributes in plugin child elements worked without problems.
